author: jmsnell
msg: Utility methods for selecting a NamedWriter instance based on the value of the Accept

author: mriou
msg: ODE-38 I pretty much had to reimplement most of the XPath 2.0 module. An upgrade of Saxon was needed and the changes made between the old version and the last version made almost the whole code obsolete. Used JAXP XPath interfaces so another implementation should be fairly easy to plugin if we decide to at some point (if you enjoy playing with differences in return types that is).

author: rooneg
msg: (getPathInfo): Add a space after the if.
(get_ccp): Don't call getCacheControl() twice when we don't need to,
and add a space after the for.

author: jmarino
msg: fix celtix autowire target not found exception

author: craigmcc
msg: Skeleton of support for Jakarta Commons SCXML as a state machine using
the shale-dialog2 abstraction APIs.  I got distracted by refactoring the
legacy state machine support so there isn't any meat here yet ... but
that will be the next step.
